title: Raani Haar: The Polki, Ruby, and Emerald Pearl Choker
materials: and Freshwater Pearls. Expertly crafted with traditional Hyderabadi polish for a lasting luster.
features: This choker features a central Polki diamond pendant, surrounded by delicate ruby petals and a halo of smaller Polki diamonds. The neckline consists of several strands of pearls interspersed with emerald beads, giving it a regal look. The central pendant has small Polki and emerald drop pendants.
colors: The choker boasts a vibrant color palette of radiant gold
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (Vivaahaalu)
it can be paired with a modern saree for a contemporary fusion look.
description: This Raani Haar is a masterpiece of South Indian craftsmanship, blending traditional design with modern elegance. The use of high-quality Polki diamonds and vibrant gemstones ensures brilliance and lasting value. The handcrafted detail and timeless design make it a cherished heirloom.
